channel.title: Client Updated, please reload
channel.description: Hello everyone, I made myself a working webclient at my site. It connects fine for me etc. Unfortunantly it has problems downloading the cache. It always goes to a certain percentage, and then it says, client updtate - please reload. Then it start giving a connection error counter. The weird thing is, in my .jar it can download the cache. I tried to host the cache myself using xampp, but no succes. also goes up to a certain percentage and than fails, maybe it's just my connection speed or 000webhost can't handle it. Any of you know maybe know a good place where I can host, And does this even have to do with where I uploaded my cache.zip? THe weird thing is that sometimes it does work. Can someone please help me?

item.title: Client Updated, please reload
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

Hello everyone,
I made myself a working webclient at my site.
It connects fine for me etc.
Unfortunantly it has problems downloading the cache.
It always goes to a certain percentage, and then it says, client updtate - please reload.
Then it start giving a connection error counter.
The weird thing is, in my .jar it can download the cache.
I tried to host the cache myself using xampp, but no succes. also goes up to a certain percentage and than fails,
maybe it’s just my connection speed or 000webhost can’t handle it.
Any of you know maybe know a good place where I can host, And does this even have to do with where I uploaded my cache.zip? THe weird thing is that sometimes it does work.
Can someone please help me?

Read full topic
